item.title: Raichur beggar donates Rs 1.83 lakh for temple renovation, inspires many
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur: In a moving example of generosity, a 60-year-old beggar from Bijnagera village in Raichur district has donated a staggering ₹1.83 lakh all from alms collected over several years for the renovation of the local Anjaneya temple. The act has won hearts and set an example that one does not need immense wealth to contribute to society; a rich heart is enough. The donor, Rangamma, originally from Andhra Pradesh, has been living in Bijnagera for over four decades, surviving solely on alms. For...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
